title: Bug Splat Ban
body: I was playing with JhinOrRengar and while I was playing I got bugsplat, after the game I got a 20 min ban, why did I get a ban for a bugsplat?

replies.body: An account can receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty after leaving too many games, and the timer is intended to give you time to troubleshoot as well as prevent any leaves that might occur.  Bugsplats can also happen if your drivers or something on your pc is failing to render the game properly, so I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix that.  Let me know if you have any questions!
